paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: LQTS2, characterized by low-amplitude notched T waves and late-onset peaked/biphasic T waves.

functional_data.summary: KCNH2 mutations lead to reduced IKr, prolonging the repolarization process.

variants.source_location: Main Text, Molecular basis of ion channel abnormalities underlying congenital LQTS section
variants.additional_notes: KCNH2 mutations are categorized by their molecular mechanisms affecting IKr.
key_quotes: Low-amplitude notched T waves and late-onset peaked/biphasic T waves are ECG features of LQTS2 individuals bearing KCNH2 variants.

extraction_metadata.notes: No specific individual-level data or penetrance statistics were provided.
